AI.result: 基于Pd含量的最高周转频率达到1.14 s-1，在452 nm波长下H2和HCHO的表观量子产率均达到87±1%，在优化反应条件下实现了高效光催化甲醇脱氢。
AI.conclusion: 该工作突出了负载金属的协同催化作用对提高光催化活性的重要性，为设计高效光催化剂提供了新思路。

title: Atomic-Scale Surface Imaging of bulk Epitaxial CsPbBr3 Perovskite Single Crystals on Mica using Light Assisted Scanning Tunneling Microscopy at Low-Temperature (80 K)
summary: Epitaxial single-crystalline CsPbBr3 perovskite films on mica, prepared ex-situ, are explored using a low-temperature scanning tunneling microscope (STM) by probing the unoccupied electronic states of their surface in ultra-high vacuum (UHV) at 80 K. Light-assisted STM measurements under a broadband illumination with visible light were employed to enhance and stabilize surface conductivity. STM imaging across the surface of macroscopic bulk CsPbBr3 films reveals large flat terraces characterized by a specific type of surface reconstruction, consisting of parallel rows of U-shaped atomic nanostructures. These structures are spaced by 12 angstroms and exhibit an internal periodicity of 5.1 angstroms. Density functional theory (DFT) calculations reproduce the experimental observations and reveal a competition between different orthorhombic CsPbBr3(110) surface reconstructions: a Cs-rich structure, identified as the most energetically stable, and three alternative PbBr rich reconstructions, which are slightly higher in energy yet remain consistent with the STM data. Additional analyses that explicitly account for the mica substrate exclude the cubic CsPbBr3 phase and other orthorhombic surface orientations, while showing that variations in the mica surface termination do not alter the preferred CsPbBr3(110) reconstruction. This combined approach thereby confirms our assignment and resolves previous STM interpretations of CsPbBr3.

AI.tldr: 外延单晶CsPbBr3钙钛矿薄膜在云母衬底上制备，通过低温STM在UHV中研究其未占据电子态，发现表面具有U形原子纳米结构的重构，DFT计算揭示了Cs-rich和PbBr-rich重构之间的竞争。
AI.motivation: 研究CsPbBr3钙钛矿薄膜的表面结构和电子性质，解决先前STM解释中的不确定性，理解表面重构机制及其稳定性。
AI.method: 使用低温扫描隧道显微镜（80K，UHV）探测外延单晶CsPbBr3薄膜的未占据电子态，结合可见光辅助STM增强表面导电性，通过DFT计算模拟不同表面重构并进行比较分析。
AI.result: STM成像显示大面积平坦平台，表面具有平行排列的U形原子纳米结构重构（间距12Å，内部周期性5.1Å）。DFT计算表明Cs-rich重构最稳定，三种PbBr-rich重构能量略高但同样符合STM数据，排除了立方相和其他正交晶系表面取向。
AI.conclusion: 结合实验和理论确认了CsPbBr3(110)表面的Cs-rich重构结构，解决了先前STM解释的争议，为钙钛矿表面性质研究提供了重要见解。

title: Low-Field Ferroelectric Switching realised by Forced Harmonic Oscillation of Domain Walls
summary: Conventionally, dc fields are used for switching dipole orientations in ferroelectrics. Such fields tilt the potential surface experienced by domain walls and thereby lower activation energies for their movement: escape from tilted potential wells is then realised by thermal excitation, allowing a "creep" process of pinning and depinning to develop. Borrowing ideas of domain wall resonance from the magnetic racetrack community, we show that ac fields, applied at the right frequency, can cause switching at much lower field magnitudes than dc ones (by factors of 4-5). Ferroelectric wall motion appears to be overdamped in the system studied (relaxor strontium barium niobate) and so the maximum in switching efficacy observed, at ~100 kHz, cannot be associated with resonant amplification, which needs an underdamped environment. Instead, in this high viscosity system, the frequency at which the maximum switching efficacy occurs seems to represent a compromise between the attempt frequency for wall depinning (which increases with frequency) and the extent to which energy is transferred to the wall within each field cycle (which decreases with frequency). Notwithstanding the absence of true resonance, the observation that ac excitation can dramatically reduce the bias levels needed for ferroelectric switching could still have significant ramifications for low energy memory technology.

AI.tldr: 交流电场在特定频率下（约100kHz）能将铁电体开关所需场强降低4-5倍，虽然系统处于过阻尼状态而非共振，但仍显著降低铁电存储器能耗。
AI.motivation: 传统铁电体开关使用直流电场，通过倾斜势能面降低畴壁运动的激活能，但需要较高场强。研究探索交流电场是否能更高效地实现铁电开关，以降低存储器能耗。
AI.method: 借鉴磁性赛道存储器中的畴壁共振概念，在弛豫型铌酸锶钡铁电体系统中施加不同频率的交流电场，研究其开关效率。系统处于过阻尼状态，分析频率对畴壁脱钉扎尝试频率和能量传递效率的平衡关系。
AI.result: 在约100kHz频率下，交流电场能将开关所需场强降低4-5倍。虽然系统过阻尼无法实现真正的共振放大，但该频率代表了脱钉扎尝试频率（随频率增加）与每个周期能量传递效率（随频率降低）的最佳折衷。
AI.conclusion: 交流电场能显著降低铁电开关所需偏置场强，这对低能耗存储器技术具有重要意义。即使在过阻尼系统中，通过优化频率仍能实现高效的开关操作。

title: Effect of oxygen content on optical, structural, and dielectric properties of Al$_x$Ta$_y$O$_z$$ thin films
summary: This study reports on the optical, structural, and dielectric properties of aluminum tantalum oxide (Al$_x$Ta$_y$O$_z$) thin films deposited at low temperature on silicon and steel substrates by pulsed direct current reactive magnetron sputtering of a target containing 80 at.% aluminum and 20 at.% tantalum in Ar/O$_2$ atmosphere. Oxygen flow rates ranging from 5.0 to 20 sccm corresponded to O content changes from 57.7 to 69.6 at.% and resulted in large differences in dielectric behavior, from films with no measurable dielectric strength to a dielectric strength of 231 V$μ$m$^{-1}$, respectively. Ab initio calculations were employed to explain the large property changes, and we show that a decrease in the dielectric strength can be linked to the formation of metal-metal bonds in the material, when the O content is less than what would correspond to a stoichiometric Ta$_2$O$_5$ and Al$_2$O$_3$ mixture. The electronic states corresponding to the metal--metal bonds are located in the band gap close to the top of the valence band, leading to an effective band gap reduction, which is directly supported by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy valence band measurements and by a broad optical absorption in the visible region.

AI.tldr: 通过脉冲直流反应磁控溅射在低温下沉积AlxTayOz薄膜，研究氧含量变化对介电性能的影响，发现氧含量不足导致金属-金属键形成，降低介电强度和有效带隙。
AI.motivation: 研究低温沉积AlxTayOz薄膜的氧含量变化如何影响其光学、结构和介电性能，特别是介电强度与氧含量的关系。
AI.method: 使用脉冲直流反应磁控溅射在硅和钢基板上低温沉积AlxTayOz薄膜，氧流量从5.0到20 sccm变化，通过第一性原理计算、X射线光电子能谱价带测量和光学吸收分析。
AI.result: 氧含量从57.7到69.6 at.%变化导致介电性能显著差异，介电强度从无法测量到231 Vμm⁻¹；氧含量低于Ta₂O₅和Al₂O₃混合物化学计量比时，金属-金属键形成导致介电强度降低和有效带隙减小。
AI.conclusion: AlxTayOz薄膜的介电性能强烈依赖于氧含量，氧不足导致金属-金属键形成，在价带顶附近的带隙中引入电子态，降低介电强度和有效带隙，这通过实验和理论计算得到证实。

title: Unveiling Photoluminescence Signatures of Magneto-Optical Coupling in Layered Hybrid Manganese Chloride Perovskites
summary: Understanding the interplay between magnetic ordering and light emission is crucial for developing magneto-optical technologies. However, this phenomenon is poorly understood since observations of this coupling vary significantly across materials. In this context, hybrid organic-inorganic metal halide perovskites (HOIPs) that incorporate Mn2+ ions are a chemically and structurally tunable platform for exploring this phenomenon, since they exhibit magnetic ordering and photoluminescence (PL) emission. Here, we study two antiferromagnetic Mn-based HOIPs with different organic cations that result in distinct lattice stiffness, Mn2+-Mn2+ distance and octahedral distortion. Temperature-dependent PL excitation spectroscopy reveals changes in crystal field splitting energy and Racah parameters well above the Néel temperature (TN), indicating the emergence of Mn2+-Mn2+ magnetic interactions prior to reach long-range magnetic ordering. These variations align with the observed changes in temperature-PL evolution. The compound with a more rigid lattice shows stronger changes closer to TN, suggesting combined effects of magnetic polarons and spin-canting. In contrast, magnetic polaron-induced magnetic modifications prevail in the HOIP with a softer lattice. These results reveal the complexity of the magneto-optical coupling in Mn-based HOIPs and provide new insights into this field extensible to other 2D materials that exhibit this phenomenon with potential for advanced magneto-optical applications.

AI.tldr: Mn基杂化有机-无机金属卤化物钙钛矿中磁有序与光发射的耦合机制研究，通过温度依赖PL激发光谱揭示了在奈尔温度以上就出现的Mn2+-Mn2+磁相互作用。
AI.motivation: 理解磁有序与光发射之间的相互作用对于开发磁光技术至关重要，但这种现象在不同材料中差异很大，需要深入研究。Mn基杂化钙钛矿具有化学和结构可调性，是探索这一现象的理想平台。
AI.method: 研究两种具有不同有机阳离子的反铁磁Mn基杂化钙钛矿，通过温度依赖的光致发光激发光谱分析晶体场分裂能和Racah参数的变化，比较不同晶格刚度对磁光耦合的影响。
AI.result: 在奈尔温度以上就观察到晶体场分裂能和Racah参数的变化，表明在达到长程磁有序之前就出现了Mn2+-Mn2+磁相互作用。晶格刚度更强的化合物在接近TN时变化更显著，而晶格较软的化合物则以磁极化子诱导的磁改性为主。
AI.conclusion: Mn基杂化钙钛矿中的磁光耦合机制复杂，涉及磁极化子和自旋倾斜的协同效应。这些发现为理解其他二维材料中的类似现象提供了新见解，对先进磁光应用具有潜力。

title: Chiral phonons in sixfold chiral CrSi$_2$: Raman spectroscopy and first-principles calculations
summary: Chiral phonons have been identified in several chiral crystals, primarily in those with trigonal symmetry and threefold screw axes. In this study, chiral phonons in CrSi$_2$, a chiral crystal with a sixfold helical structure, were investigated. Circularly polarized Raman spectroscopy revealed a subtle splitting of doubly degenerate $E_2$ phonon modes between cross-circular polarization configurations. These observations, supported by first-principles phonon calculations, indicate the presence of chiral phonons in CrSi$_2$, expanding the scope of materials that exhibit chiral vibrational modes beyond the conventional trigonal class.

AI.tldr: 在具有六重螺旋结构的CrSi₂手性晶体中发现了手性声子，扩展了手性振动模式材料的范围
AI.motivation: 之前的手性声子研究主要集中在具有三重对称性和三重螺旋轴的手性晶体中，本研究旨在探索具有六重螺旋结构的CrSi₂中是否存在手性声子，以扩展手性声子材料的范围
AI.method: 使用圆偏振拉曼光谱技术研究CrSi₂晶体，观察交叉圆偏振配置下双重简并E₂声子模式的细微分裂，并通过第一性原理声子计算进行验证
AI.result: 圆偏振拉曼光谱观察到E₂声子模式在交叉圆偏振配置下的细微分裂，第一性原理计算支持这些观察结果，证实了CrSi₂中存在手性声子
AI.conclusion: 在具有六重螺旋结构的CrSi₂手性晶体中成功观测到手性声子，这将手性振动模式材料的范围从传统的三角晶系扩展到更广泛的材料类别

title: Multi-Method Li Plating Characterization of a Commercial 26 Ah Li-Ion Pouch-Cell
summary: Lithium (Li) plating on graphite is a significant degradation mechanism in Li-ion batteries. While numerous experimental techniques have been used to study Li plating in laboratory cells, investigations of commercial high-energy cells often rely on electrochemical methods. Here we present and classify various methods for detecting Li plating on a commercial A123 pouch cell. In a round robin study across multiple battery research laboratories, Li-plated graphitic electrode material was analyzed using electrochemical, microscopic, and spectroscopic methods capable of detecting metallic Li deposits. After cell opening, their overall distribution on the anode surface was examined using a flatbed scanner to ensure comparability of the samples. Optical and electron microscopy provided detailed surface and, in combination with a focused ion beam, subsurface structure and morphology. Spectroscopic methods confirmed the presence and onset of plated Li with varying sensitivity. Moreover, spectroscopic and imaging techniques were combined correlatively where possible. Availability and measurement duration of each technique was compared. Optical methods are fast and easy to use; thus, they are recommended for most samples, with spectroscopic confirmation reserved for reference samples. This multimodal study demonstrates a range of methods that can be used alone or in combination to qualitatively or quantitatively detect Li-plating.

AI.tldr: 该研究对商用锂离子电池的石墨负极锂枝晶析出检测方法进行了系统分类和比较，通过多实验室协作评估了电化学、显微和光谱技术的检测能力。
AI.motivation: 锂在石墨负极上的析出是锂离子电池的重要衰减机制，目前对商用高能量电池的研究主要依赖电化学方法，需要系统评估多种检测技术的适用性和互补性。
AI.method: 采用多实验室协作的循环比对研究，对A123商用软包电池的锂析出石墨电极材料进行分析，结合电化学、光学显微镜、电子显微镜（包括聚焦离子束）、光谱学等多种技术，并进行相关性组合分析。
AI.result: 光学方法快速易用，适合大多数样品；光谱方法灵敏度各异但能确认锂析出的存在和起始；不同技术可单独或组合使用进行定性和定量检测；通过平板扫描仪确保样品可比性。
AI.conclusion: 多模态研究展示了一系列可单独或组合使用的锂析出检测方法，推荐光学方法用于常规样品，光谱确认用于参考样品，为锂析出检测提供了系统的方法学指导。

title: Interpretable Machine Learning of Nanoparticle Stability through Topological Layer Embeddings
summary: The stability of chemically complex nanoparticles is governed by an immense configurational space arising from heterogeneous local atomic environments across surface and interior regions. Efficiently identifying low-energy configurations within this space remains a central challenge for first-principles-based materials discovery, particularly when the available reference data are limited. Here, we introduce a data-efficient and physically interpretable machine-learning framework based on a fragmented, layer-resolved descriptor that explicitly decomposes nanoparticles into surface, intermediate, and core environments using a topology-driven definition. This representation preserves a compact and fixed feature dimensionality while retaining spatial resolution, enabling controlled emphasis on different regions of the nanoparticle through physically motivated weighting schemes. Coupled with gradient-boosted decision tree models and a ranking-based learning strategy, the proposed framework enables accurate identification of the most stable nanoparticle configurations using only a few hundred density functional theory reference calculations. Ranking performance metrics demonstrate near-saturation of correlation, high top-k recall, and rapidly vanishing regret at moderate training-set sizes, highlighting the strong data efficiency of the approach. Beyond predictive performance, layer-weighting and SHAP-based interpretability analyses reveal how surface segregation, coordination topology, and local chemical disorder contribute differently to stability across spatial regions of the nanoparticle. These insights provide a transparent physical interpretation of the learned models and establish a natural pathway toward active learning-driven exploration of complex nanoparticle configurational spaces.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种基于分层描述符的数据高效机器学习框架，用于从有限的第一性原理数据中准确识别复杂纳米颗粒的最低能量构型。
AI.motivation: 化学复杂纳米颗粒的稳定性由表面和内部区域异质局部原子环境产生的巨大构型空间决定。在参考数据有限的情况下，高效识别这些空间中的低能量构型是基于第一性原理的材料发现面临的核心挑战。
AI.method: 引入基于碎片化、分层解析描述符的数据高效且物理可解释的机器学习框架。该描述符使用拓扑驱动定义将纳米颗粒分解为表面、中间和核心环境，保持紧凑且固定的特征维度同时保留空间分辨率。结合梯度提升决策树模型和基于排名的学习策略。
AI.result: 该框架仅使用几百个密度泛函理论参考计算就能准确识别最稳定的纳米颗粒构型。排名性能指标显示相关性接近饱和、高top-k召回率，在中等训练集规模下遗憾值迅速消失，突显了方法的数据高效性。
AI.conclusion: 分层加权和SHAP可解释性分析揭示了表面偏析、配位拓扑和局部化学无序如何在不同空间区域对稳定性做出不同贡献。这些见解为学习模型提供了透明的物理解释，并为主动学习驱动的复杂纳米颗粒构型空间探索建立了自然途径。

title: The influence of Y content on grain structure evolution in Mg-Y alloys
summary: To advance the understanding of microstructural evolution behavior in Mg-rare earth alloys, the effect of yttrium (Y) addition on static recrystallization and grain growth in Mg alloys was systematically investigated in extruded Mg-1wt.%Y and Mg-7wt.%Y alloys. Y addition was found to significantly retard the microstructural evolution, primarily due to its solute drag effect arising from Y segregation at grain boundaries. The relative intensity of solute drag effects from different alloying elements in Mg alloys was further assessed from both thermodynamic and kinetic perspectives, considering their grain boundary segregation tendencies and diffusivities. Additionally, static recrystallization in Mg-Y alloys was observed to proceed via a two-stage behavior characterized with two distinct JMAK exponents, indicating the heterogeneous nucleation of recrystallized grains. Abnormal grain growth (AGG) behavior was observed in these Mg-Y alloys. Overall, this study highlights the critical role of Y segregation at grain boundaries in controlling recrystallization and grain growth kinetics in Mg-Y alloys. This provides new insights into the design of thermally stable Mg alloys with refined microstructures.

AI.tldr: Y添加通过晶界偏析的溶质拖曳效应显著延缓Mg合金的静态再结晶和晶粒长大，揭示了Mg-Y合金中两阶段再结晶行为和异常晶粒长大现象。
AI.motivation: 为了深入理解Mg-稀土合金的微观结构演化行为，系统研究Y添加对Mg合金静态再结晶和晶粒长大的影响，为设计具有热稳定性和细化微观结构的Mg合金提供理论基础。
AI.method: 系统研究挤压态Mg-1wt.%Y和Mg-7wt.%Y合金中Y添加对静态再结晶和晶粒长大的影响，从热力学和动力学角度评估不同合金元素在Mg合金中的溶质拖曳效应相对强度，分析晶界偏析倾向和扩散性。
AI.result: Y添加显著延缓微观结构演化，主要归因于Y在晶界偏析产生的溶质拖曳效应；Mg-Y合金的静态再结晶呈现两阶段行为，具有两个不同的JMAK指数，表明再结晶晶粒的异质形核；观察到异常晶粒长大行为。
AI.conclusion: Y在晶界偏析对控制Mg-Y合金再结晶和晶粒长大动力学起关键作用，为设计具有热稳定性和细化微观结构的Mg合金提供了新见解。

title: Discovery of Polymer Electrolytes with Bayesian Optimization and High-Throughput Molecular Dynamics simulations
summary: Polymer electrolytes are critical for safe, high-energy-density solid-state batteries, yet discovering candidates that balance high ionic conductivity with high transference numbers remains a significant challenge. In this work, we develop a high-throughput screening platform that utilizes molecular dynamics simulations to navigate a chemical space of 1.7 million hypothetical polymer electrolyte candidates. Data from previous literature is used to warm-start batch Bayesian optimization for iteratively selecting new polymer electrolytes to evaluate. We iteratively identified, evaluated and analyzed 767 homopolymers as potential candidates. Our results reveal several candidates with transport properties exceeding the benchmark polyethylene oxide (PEO)/LiTFSI system. Crucially, our optimization campaigns for ionic conductivity and Li-diffusivity demonstrate that branched architectures and ketone functional groups significantly enhance ion-hopping mechanisms within the polymer matrix. We provide an in-depth mechanistic comparison of Li vs. Na cation transport and offer our open-source framework to accelerate the discovery of liquid, gel, and multi-cation electrolyte systems.

AI.tldr: 开发高通量筛选平台，利用分子动力学模拟探索170万种假设聚合物电解质，通过贝叶斯优化迭代筛选出767种候选物，发现多个性能优于PEO/LiTFSI基准的聚合物，揭示支化结构和酮官能团能显著增强离子传输
AI.motivation: 聚合物电解质对于安全、高能量密度固态电池至关重要，但寻找同时具有高离子电导率和高迁移数的候选材料仍面临重大挑战
AI.method: 开发高通量筛选平台，利用分子动力学模拟探索170万种假设聚合物电解质化学空间；使用文献数据预热批量贝叶斯优化，迭代选择新聚合物进行评估；共评估分析了767种均聚物候选物
AI.result: 发现多个候选物的传输性能超过基准PEO/LiTFSI系统；优化实验表明支化结构和酮官能团能显著增强聚合物基质中的离子跳跃机制；深入比较了Li与Na阳离子传输机制
AI.conclusion: 开发的开源框架可加速液体、凝胶和多阳离子电解质系统的发现；支化结构和酮官能团是设计高性能聚合物电解质的关键结构特征

title: First-principles Newns-Anderson Hamiltonian Construction for Chemisorbed Hydrogen at Metal Surfaces
summary: The Newns-Anderson Hamiltonian is widely used to describe adsorption at gas-solid interfaces, yet its construction typically relies on simplifying assumptions such as constant coupling and the wideband limit approximation. Here, we present a first-principles approach to construct Newns-Anderson Hamiltonians by applying projection operator diabatisation to Hamiltonian matrices obtained from Kohn-Sham density functional theory calculations. We demonstrate this method for chemisorbed hydrogen on three fcc metal(111) surfaces: Al, Cu, and Pt. To validate the electronic coupling between adsorbed hydrogen and the metal surface, we compute the projected density of states, electronic tunnelling lifetimes, and vibrational lifetimes from the constructed Newns-Anderson Hamiltonians and find good agreement with reference calculations. Analysis of the chemisorption function reveals that the wideband limit approximation is valid for H/Al(111) but has limited applicability for H/Cu(111) and H/Pt(111).

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种基于第一性原理构建Newns-Anderson哈密顿量的方法，通过投影算符对角化Kohn-Sham DFT哈密顿矩阵，应用于H在Al、Cu、Pt(111)表面的化学吸附，验证了宽频极限近似的适用范围。
AI.motivation: 传统的Newns-Anderson哈密顿量在描述气固界面吸附时通常依赖于简化假设（如常数耦合和宽频极限近似），这些假设的适用性有限，需要一种基于第一性原理的精确构建方法。
AI.method: 采用投影算符对角化方法，将Kohn-Sham密度泛函理论计算得到的哈密顿矩阵转换为Newns-Anderson哈密顿量，应用于H在三种fcc金属(111)表面（Al、Cu、Pt）的化学吸附体系。
AI.result: 构建的Newns-Anderson哈密顿量计算的投影态密度、电子隧穿寿命和振动寿命与参考计算结果吻合良好。分析表明宽频极限近似对H/Al(111)有效，但对H/Cu(111)和H/Pt(111)适用性有限。
AI.conclusion: 提出的第一性原理方法能够准确构建Newns-Anderson哈密顿量，揭示了宽频极限近似在不同金属表面的适用性差异，为精确描述化学吸附体系提供了可靠工具。
